about_the_game:
Manatee: A Creature Collector Clicker Game

Dive into the world of "Manatee," a delightful creature collector clicker game where every click brings you closer to building the ultimate manatee sanctuary!

  • Collect Manatees and Make Money: Tap the manatees to earn money and expand your aquatic collection.
  • Timed Rewards: Receive a random manatee drop every 3 hours.
  • Exclusive Manatees: Rare and exclusive manatees can be dropped, each with unique traits and characteristics.
  • Coming Soon! Upgrade Your Aquarium: Use your earnings to purchase exclusive items for your manatees and stunning decorations for your aquarium. Create the ultimate manatee sanctuary!

Join the Manatee community today and start building your dream aquarium, filled with the gentle giants of the sea. Share your progress, compete with friends, and show off your one-of-a-kind collection.
detailed_description:
Manatee: A Creature Collector Clicker Game

Dive into the world of "Manatee," a delightful creature collector clicker game where every click brings you closer to building the ultimate manatee sanctuary!

  • Collect Manatees and Make Money: Tap the manatees to earn money and expand your aquatic collection.
  • Timed Rewards: Receive a random manatee drop every 3 hours.
  • Exclusive Manatees: Rare and exclusive manatees can be dropped, each with unique traits and characteristics.
  • Coming Soon! Upgrade Your Aquarium: Use your earnings to purchase exclusive items for your manatees and stunning decorations for your aquarium. Create the ultimate manatee sanctuary!

Join the Manatee community today and start building your dream aquarium, filled with the gentle giants of the sea. Share your progress, compete with friends, and show off your one-of-a-kind collection.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Manatee is an epic creature-collecting clicker game! Earn money to expand your aquarium and invest in upgrades to earn even more money. Every 3 hours a random manatee will be dropped. Join the Manatee community today!
